title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS MASTERCLASS / MESMERISMUS®
description:
Dr. Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclasses are realized all around the world. In them, he teaches his students the most unique and ancient techniques of Fascination - the power of the gaze & Mesmerism. Dr. Paret will share some interesting facts about the name Mesmerismus® and we will some of his students doing non-verbal hypnosis exercises in nature, on his masterclass. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
 https://www.youtube.com/user/neurolinguistic  

Join our Italian channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/pnlcoaching
